New Records: Bobby Witt Jr. hit 100 RBIs for the season
Key Match Events: Bobby Witt Jr. hit a solo home run in the first inning
Bobby Witt Jr. hit a sacrifice fly in the fifth
Bobby Witt Jr. hit a run-scoring double in the sixth
Maikol Garcia and Kyle Isbel each had three stolen bases
Kansas City's Michael Massey doubled and scored on Jared Triolo's error in the fifth
Bobby Witt Jr.'s RBI double in the sixth was misplayed by Cruz
Post-Match Reflections: Bobby Witt Jr. expressed happiness in achieving 100 RBIs
Manager Matt Quatraro mentioned the team's goal of winning the division and the significance of a winning record
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals won for the seventh time in nine games
The Royals assured themselves of their first winning season since 2015
Mitch Keller lost for the fifth time in his last six decisions
Others: RHP Chris Stratton was placed on the 15-day injured list and LHP Angel Zerpa was recalled from Triple-A Omaha
The series concludes Sunday with Royals RHP Brady Singer facing rookie RHP Jared Jones
